content=Guests can enjoy the view of Mt. Fuji from both room and bathroom. The chartered barrier-free open-air baths are also popular.
address=10 Asakawa, Fujikawaguchiko-machi, Minamitsuru-gun, Yamanashi, Japan
directions=About 30 minutes walk from Kawaguchiko Station.
content=A high class Japanese-style inn with views of Mt.Fuji and Kawaguchiko from both the bedrooms and the large bathrooms. The bathrooms also feature an open-air bath.
address=4025 Funatsu, Fujikawaguchiko-machi, Minamitsuru-gun, Yamanashi, Japan
directions=About 10 minutes walk from Kawaguchiko Station.

content=Kasuitei Ooya is contemporary Japanese style inn standing just on the shore of Lake Kawaguchi. It has renovated rooms with private open-air bath and observation bathroom. Guests can enjoy more hot springs than ever before.
address=511 Katsuyama, Fujikawaguchiko-machi, Minamitsuru-gun, Yamanashi, Japan
directions=8 min by taxi from Kawaguchiko Station.

content=The Fuji View Hotel stands just on the shore of Kawaguchiko. Guests can appreciate natural beauties including the garden in the hotel property. The garden accommodates gorgeous view of blossoms of over 300 cherry trees in over 99,000 square meters (110,000 square yards).
address=2312, Kawaguchi, Fuji Kawaguchiko-machi, Minamitsuru-gun, Yamanashi-ken, 401-0304
directions=Take the Retro Bus Kawaguchiko Line to Kubota Kazutake Bijyutsukan or call at the front desk for a pickup bus.
content=This hotel is located near Kawaguchiko and All rooms and hot springs have a magnificent view of Mt. Fuji. Guests can enjoy the beautiful Mt. Fuji changing its feature from season to season.
address=6713-22 Funatsu, Fujikawaguchikomachi, Minamitsuru-gun, Yamanashi, 401-0301, Japan
directions=Take the Fuji Kyuko Retro-Bus and get off at Kawaguchiko Herb-kan.
content=The most reasonable hostel with hot spring in the Kawaguchiko area.
